description: Have you ever had an annoying radical number that you couldn't simplify all of the way? Root Simplifier automatically simplifies square roots instantly. You can use it to easily simplify anything from just the square root of 200 to something crazy like the square root of 459572048656. This is a powerful app with a simple and easy to use interface. Please feel free to suggest additional features. If you have any concerns or suggestions, feel free to contact us. We read every comment and do what we can to update and improve our apps.
